name: Mürekkep
description: Mürekkep is a blog site where writers publish personal posts and stay connected with their readers through updates on new content.

name: Not Kutusu
description: Not Kutusu is a web-based application designed for students of Istanbul Technical University (ITU) to upload and access lecture notes, promoting academic collaboration and resource sharing.

name: Game of Thrones
description: A web application developed using Angular to fetch and display quotes from the Game of Thrones TV series.
